title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
desc: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
org: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

records.QueryText: tell me about flower drop in chilly
records.KccAns: SPRAY OF PLANOFIX 1 ML PER 4 LITER WATER FOR CONTROL OF FLOWER DROPING
Good variety of maize- saktiman 1-4, ganga-11, suan, devki

records.QueryText: information regarding peroning after syray in apple ?
records.KccAns: spray of nila thotha@1kg and 1kg chuna in 100lt water.

records.QueryText: AALO MAI ZINC OR SULPHER KI MATRA
records.KccAns: AALO MAI 25 KILO ZINC 50 KILO SULPHER KA PROYOG KARE
Late sowing vareites - DBW-14, k-9162. k-9533, DBW-16, PBW-373 , UP-2425

records.QueryText: how to control yellowing of leaf in wheat?
How to control fungal diseases in musterd?
records.KccAns: How to control fungal diseases in musterd-Spray 500 gm. Mencozeb in 200 lt. of water per acre.

records.QueryText: tell me market rate of guar
for pod formation and fungus attack on tur?
records.KccAns: Spray Bavistine 30gm + Microlla 30 ml + 00:52:34 50 gm/15lit of Water.
apply urea 25 kg, potash 15 kg, micronutrient mixture 5 kg/ac
Explain details and contact to agriculture office

records.QueryText: gehu ka jamav kam hua hai

records.KccAns: SPRAY PROPICONAZOLE @ 1.5 ML/ 2 LIT. OF WATER.
weather in nalgonda chance of showers

records.QueryText: TELL ME ABOUT CONTROL OF CUT WORM IN GRAM
records.KccAns: SPRAY OF ACEPHATE 75% SP 2 GM PER LITER WATER
USE 2-4 D  @ 500 GM A.I. / 500 LITER WATER/ HAC. WEEDICIDE IN BARLEY
Pyaj ki prajati ? pusa red , nashik red

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING FOR THE CONTROL OF  PHALARIS MINOR & WILD OAT WEEDS IN WHEAT(KANAK) CROP?
records.KccAns: FOR THE CONTROL OF  PHALARIS MINOR & WILD OAT WEEDS IN WHEAT(KANAK) CROP- SPRAY CLODINAFOP 15%WP(TOPIK)-160GM OR PINOXADEN 5%EC(AXIAL)-400ML OR SULFOSULFURON-75%WG(LEADER)-13GM OR MESOSULFURON+LODOSULFURON 3.6%WDG(ATLANTIS)-160GM OR SULFOSULFURON+METSULFURON 75%WG(TOTAL)-16GM MIXED WITH 100 LITRE WATER PER ACRE.

records.QueryText: TELL ME ABOUT OF NO PROPER  GROWTH IN WHEAT
records.KccAns: ZINK SULPHATE DOSE FOR WHEAT - 20-25 KG/HA ON SOIL TESTING BASE

records.QueryText: TELL ME CONTROL TARMAIET PEST IN BARLEY.

records.KccAns: 135 kilogram dap,275 kilogram urea , 66 kilogram mop/hectare ki dar se prayog kare
Late sowing vareites - DBW-14, k-9162. k-9533, DBW-16, PBW-373 , UP-2425
apply urea 25 kg, potash 15 kg, micronutrient mixture 5 kg/ac

records.QueryText: CONTROL OF BACTERIAL WILT IN POTATO
records.KccAns: SPRAY COPPER OXYCHLORIDE 50% WP @ 4 GM/LIT. WATER WITH STREPTOCYCLIN @ 1 GM/10 LIT. OF WATER

records.QueryText: GEHU ME KRPTVAR KI DVA BTA DE

records.KccAns: spray complex 19:19:19 5 g / lit of water

records.QueryText: ask for sowing time of cumin
records.KccAns: sowing time of cumin 1 week of november
APPLY MANCOJZEB @ 2.5-3 GRAM/1.5LIT/1 KG. OF SEED.

records.QueryText: ask about control of sucking pest in wheat
aalu ka beej sodhan kis rasayan se kare

records.KccAns: Local cultivar: Salem and Erode,Co 1, BSR 1, Roma, Swarna, Sudarshana, Suguna, Sugandham, BSR 2, Ranga
SPRAY OF CARBERYL 50% EC 4 GM PER LITER WATER

records.QueryText: tamatar ki tahani gal rahi hai
records.KccAns: Carbendazim 2 gram /litre pani me ghol banakar spray kare
methyl o demoton 10 ml/10 liter water
